meanings.definition: A person who is excessively self-centered and believes in their own importance.
meanings.sent1: Some egoists only care about themselves and ignore the needs of others.
meanings.sent2: The egoists in the group always try to make everything about themselves.
meanings.sent3: The egoists at the party kept talking about themselves non-stop, making everyone roll their eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her boss was such an egoist, always thinking he was the most important person in the room.
meanings.sent5: The egoists in the movie were portrayed as selfish characters who only cared about their own desires.
